Text:
This is the EVO rip, why did you take the tag of the ripping team off then thank Raymondhome (who is simply a mass uploader)?

There is already multiple versions of this (crappy) 800mb rip on TPB.  I cannot understand why someone would download a movie from one of the TPB Vip, only to re-upload it themself.  Can you not see that it is pointless?
